mapper.select: select * from (select a.goods_order_id, d.company_name, a.order_price, c.cas_no, c.chinese_name, a.create_time, a.express_way, a.order_type, b.make_bill, c.image from t_goods_order a left join t_real_order_callprice b on a.call_price_id = b.real_call_id left join t_real_order c on b.real_order_id = c.real_order_id left join t_certification d on b.user_id = d.user_id where a.order_type = 'REAL' and b.user_id = #{userId} and a.state = #{state} UNION select a.goods_order_id, d.company_name, a.order_price, c.cas_no, c.chinese_name, a.create_time, a.express_way, a.order_type, b.make_bill, c.image from t_goods_order a left join t_query_order_callprice b on a.call_price_id = b.query_call_id left join t_query_order c on b.query_order_id = c.query_order_id left join t_certification d on b.user_id = d.user_id where a.order_type = 'QUERY' and b.user_id = #{userId} and a.state = #{state}) rs
